WorkItem.Description:
I select an number of pieces of gear for optimization that I currently possess in game.  As soon as I refresh my profile from armory, all those items I select as being available for optimizer get cleared.  The otimized items also get cleared apon closing RAWR.
Â 
This is frustrating as I have to continually go through each slot and select every piece of gear I possess in order to use optimizer.  This didn't occur in 2.1.4.
WorkItem.Summary: Items marked as available for optimization get reset upon closing or reloading profile on armory.

Comments.Message: Can someone explain this? I can't repro this. What circumstances does this happen under?

1. Load character from character profiler
2. Select some extra gear from what is available.
3. Reload char from armory

And all your selections are gone... Inclusive those from character profiler.
Hmmm, I use the moonkin module... Forgot that.. :-)
Is this only from character profiler? If you start a new character, or load from the armory, does it not happen?

Started happening to me immediately after updating to 2.1.6 (from 2.1.5). Reproducible 100% of the time for me with the following:
  1) Load a character from an XML file
  2) Tools -> Reload Current Character from Armory
  3) Observe that all items marked "Obtained"/"Available" have been unmarked.

In some cases, Rawr is put in a state where simply switching between different slots unmarks all items that have been marked, but I have been unable to reproduce that.

I apparently have the same issue:

1) Load a character using "Load from Armory..."
2) Select an item or two in the "Comparisons" pane as "Available for Optimizer" (turns the diamonds on the left side of items from clear to green)
3) Use the Tools >> "Reload Current Character from Armory" menu entry to update character info.
4) All previously selected items are now unselected.
This issue also seems to be a duplicate of http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=12292
Is anyone able to reproduce this on the latest development build?
